name: Deja Vu II: Lost in Las Vegas
name_original: Deja Vu II: Lost in Las Vegas
description: Deja Vu II: Lost in Las Vegas is a point-and-click adventure game, the sequel to Deja Vu: a Nightmare Comes True, set in the world of 1940s hard-boiled detective novels and movies. It was the last game made in the MacVenture series.
